sub_title: Working on something new... 🔥 | Available for interim transition projects on sustainability, (digital) marketing, and people & culture.
summary:
Hi, I'm Chris, a passionate digital Brand Strategist with a knack for uniting people, creating cultures, and crafting brand that give meaningful purpose to businesses. I thrive on collaborating with talented freelancers, global teams, and clients to create impactful brand strategies that make a statement and connect with society.

My fascination lies in the power of brands to shape their environment, and I'm constantly curious about how new business models can impact our future. As a technology enthusiast, I believe in the transformative potential of technology and am committed to helping people, businesses, and society understand and embrace it. 

As a Marketing Director at Innovadis, I'm driving sustainable innovation through strategic partnerships and events. My goal is to inspire others by sharing knowledge, and connect innovations & sustainable initiatives to the right people.

If you're looking for someone who can help your company make a meaningful impact in today's age, feel free to drop me a line. I'd be happy to share my expertise & network and discuss how we can work together to achieve your brand's goals.

profile_positions.description:
Let’s create positive impact!

We are Innovadis and we guide and accompany you on the journey to positive impact. Step-by-step. Not only do we have decades of experience on this journey, we also have the skills to get to your destination. First, we map out the journey by analysing where we are now and what kind of positive impact you would like to make. Both for your organisation and for the people you work for. After setting the goals, we rise to the challenge and create the roadmap to a better future. We love this part because we eat impossible puzzles for breakfast and come up with useful solutions to bigger problems every day. Sometimes just for fun.

On our journey we choose the most suitable solutions from the shelf or we develop the best solution ourselves. Of course, we know from experience that your world, our world, changes every day. That is why we will remain flexible and improve the solutions over and over again. That’s how we stay on track and achieve our positive impact goals.

So we are curious. What’s your goal and how can we help you make a positive impact?  Let's find out together and explore and develop a better tomorrow. 

We are Innovadis. Who are you?
profile_positions.title: Director Marketing & Design

profile_positions.description:
As a Digital Brand Strategist with a passion for high-tech and automotive, I focus on shaping experiences through strategy & impactful design that contributes to the audience’s journey of life. I work with highly skilled freelancers, global teams & clients, crafting impactful brand concepts, with a commitment to empowering the digital frontier as a partner to future proof brands.

I am fascinated how the internet has changed our lives, and I am curious to discover what it will bring for the future. My mission helps people, business, and society understand and embrace how digital technology will change their world. International websites, brand experiences, campaigns or complex digital transformation projects?

Drop me a line if you would like to team up!
profile_positions.title: Digital Brand Strategist

profile_positions.description:
Creating new standards in the digital world

We are Sticky Bandits we help brands become meaningful by changing their vision on the (digital working) world.

It is our mission to help people, businesses and the society to understand and embrace the digital world because it will change their way of living. We’ll create a connection between business development, processes, work environments and target groups. How? Simple: by combining strategy, technology and creativity in future-proof concepts. Every champion was once a contender that refused to give up. We don’t believe in boundaries, everything is possible.

We are ambitious in finding simple solutions to complicated challenges and we present freaking awesome results. Brands that want to achieve success, have to do things differently. Our goal? Developing a better world for tomorrow in the coolest way: together. Let’s make an impression to remember.
profile_positions.title: Oprichter & algemeen directeur

company.name: Cooper Tire & Rubber Company Europe Ltd.

profile_positions.company: Cooper Tire & Rubber Company Europe Ltd.
profile_positions.description:
As the Interim Digital Brand Manager at Cooper Tires, I spearheaded the highly acclaimed brand/digital transformation program, which led to the comprehensive overhaul of Cooper Tires' digital landscape from 2008 to 2018. In a span of just 8 months, Together with the team we successfully streamlined the product information flow, established a cohesive house of brands structure, and oversaw the launch of two major brand websites for Cooper Tires and Avon Tyres in the EMEA & US regions.

Moreover, I effectively managed the brand activation phase by spearheading global campaigns, orchestrating digital productions for international events such as the Geneva International Motorshow and Tire Cologne, and forging strategic content alliances with renowned racing drivers like David Coulthard, Peter Solberg & Robert Doornbos. My successful execution of these initiatives helped position Cooper Tires as a leading offroad player in the highly competitive automotive industry.
profile_positions.title: Digital brand manager EMEA (interim)

profile_positions.description:
As the Founder of Urbanguide, a Dutch travel startup, I am passionate about giving visitors the opportunity to experience a city like a local. We believe that the true magic of a city lies in the eyes of its residents, and it's the small details that create a truly unforgettable experience.

Our unique platform connects tourists with local residents who create digital city experiences based on their personal interests. Whether you're interested in photography, gardening, or something else entirely, we work with our network of locals to curate a personalized city experience just for you.

With Urbanguide, you can download a customized city guide for a small fee, complete with recommendations and insights from a local resident. We're committed to making cities magical again, one personalized experience at a time.

If you're looking for an innovative travel solution that puts the magic of a city in the hands of its residents, look no further than Urbanguide.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
As an Interim Digital Brand Manager at Apollo Tyres, I spearheaded the digitization program across the EMEA region, with a focus on setting up a new digital architecture. In this role, I successfully rolled out e-commerce platforms across the EMEA region, developed brand websites for Apollo Tyres and Vredestein, migrated the Product Information Management system to SAP and implemented a digital shopping concept for the Inner Circle soft franchise program.

I also worked on the production & online management of successful international campaigns across Europe such as the Quatrac 5 introduction and the Hardwell campaign featuring high-profile ambassadors such as DJ Hardwell and Carmen Jorda. Through effective campaign management and collaboration with global teams, we were able to achieve exceptional results and elevate the Apollo Tyres & Vredestein brands across the region.
profile_positions.title: Digital Brand manager EMEA (interim)

profile_positions.description:
At LimeSquare, I was part of a dynamic team of marketing professionals who pride themselves on bringing a fresh, out-of-the-box approach to each project.offers a full suite of services, from developing new brand identities and repositioning strategies to implementing comprehensive brand activation campaigns and providing ongoing maintenance and education. 

As an Online Marketing Consultant at LimeSquare, I had the pleasure of working closely with our clients to develop and execute successful online campaigns, manage social media content production, and deliver comprehensive training through our online marketing academy. I had the opportunity to work with a diverse range of clients, including Apollo Tyres, Vredestein, Fischer, Gemeente Enschede, Tremco Illbruck, Gebroeders Bodegraven, Pouw Automotive Groep, SABA, TKF, Undutchables, and the University of Twente.
profile_positions.title: Online Marketing Consultant

profile_positions.description: As a volunteer at the TEDxBinnenhof Catwalk for Innovation, an event hosted by the Dutch Ministry of Finance, my role involved assisting in organizing the event at the historic Ridderzaal in The Hague. I played a key role in running online marketing campaigns before, during and after the event, and was responsible for creating and maintaining the TedxBinnenhof website. The event featured thought-provoking talks on cutting-edge ideas from the Netherlands, aimed at addressing global issues such as climate change, natural resource scarcity, loss of biodiversity, pollution, and rising healthcare costs. By showcasing the innovative capabilities of the Netherlands, we aimed to inspire and motivate people to think creatively and develop innovative solutions to these challenges.
profile_positions.title: Online Marketeer

profile_positions.description: In my role at Quality Online, I was entrusted with the responsibility of overseeing the Marketing & Communication activities. Quality Online is a Dutch company that specializes in providing advanced Enterprise Process Management Solutions. Our software solutions cater to a wide range of organizational processes, including Risk Management, Safety Management, Incident Management, and Compliance Management. By leveraging our software, organizations can achieve greater efficiency and streamline their operations. My duties involved managing and executing various marketing and communication initiatives to raise awareness about the company's offerings and to attract new customers.
profile_positions.title: Marketing & Communicatie Specialist

profile_positions.description: At PC Hotel.nl, a privately owned company specializing in providing cutting-edge IT & marketing solutions to consumers and small companies, I held the position of owner / IT & Marketing Solutions Specialist. Our offerings included IT hardware, cloud applications / migrations office365, Virtual machines VMWare, and website development services. Our mission was to empower our clients with the latest technology and help them achieve their business objectives. In 2012, PC Hotel.nl was acquired by EP Computers, a trusted player in the local IT industry.
profile_positions.title: Founder
